Detailed Description

A rectangular bounding box of a polygon.

It can sometimes be cheaper to use a bounding box instead of the accurate locations and do the real calcuation only if the bounding box passes.

Author:
valliappa.lakshmanan

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

edu.ou.asgbook.rasterization.BoundingBox.BoundingBox ( LatLon[]  vertices  )  

00022                                           {
00023         ScalarStatistic lat = new ScalarStatistic();
00024         ScalarStatistic lon = new ScalarStatistic();
00025         for (int i=0; i < vertices.length; ++i){
00026             lat.update(vertices[i].getLat());
00027             lon.update(vertices[i].getLon());
00028         }
00029         maxx = lat.getMax();
00030         maxy = lon.getMax();
00031         minx = lat.getMin();
00032         miny = lon.getMin();
00033     }

00035                                                {

00037     }

void edu.ou.asgbook.rasterization.BoundingBox.update ( BoundingBox  a  )  

00052                                      {
00053         minx = Math.min(minx, a.minx);
00054         miny = Math.min(miny, a.miny);
00055         maxx = Math.max(maxx, a.maxx);
00056         maxy = Math.max(maxy, a.maxy);
00057     }
